archdesc.bioghist: Temperance League of St. Clair, in St. Clair County, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: Bound manuscript containing Constitution of the Temperance League of St. Clair, Mich., approved and adopted on March 28, 1850, amended on January 12, 1859. The volume includes a promissory note regarding erecting and furnishing a Meeting House for the St. Clair Congregational Church, dated April 6, 1856. Also a list of 150 names of people who signed the pledge not to drink.
